alert.note: Alert for Noble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 25 at 1:39AM EDT until March 25 at 2:07PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of east central Ohio, including the following county, Noble. * WHEN...Until 800 AM EDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 137 AM EDT, gauge reports indicate Duck Creek is running high. Minor flooding is ongoing in Locations along Duck Creek. - Locations along Duck Creek. is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.2 to 0.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dexter City. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
